price: Tí ó bá jẹ́ pé Olúwa rẹ bá fẹ́, ìbá ṣe àwọn ènìyàn ní ìjọ ẹlẹ́sìn kan ṣoṣo. (Àmọ́) wọn kò níí yé yapa-ẹnu (lórí ’Islām)
arabic: وَلَوۡ شَآءَ رَبُّكَ لَجَعَلَ ٱلنَّاسَ أُمَّةٗ وَٰحِدَةٗۖ وَلَا يَزَالُونَ مُخۡتَلِفِينَ

version.title: Yoruba translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Yoruba by Abu Rahima Mikhail Aikweiny, printed in 1432 H.

meta.transliteration: walaw shāa rabbuka lajaʿala al-nāsa ummatan wāḥidatan walā yazālūna mukh'talifīna
